web_app_launch_id.description: Identifier of Web App launch, received from openWebApp

answerWebAppQuery.description: Sets the result of interaction with a Web App and sends corresponding message on behalf of the user to the chat from which the query originated; for bots only

web_app_query_id.description: Identifier of the Web App query

getCallbackQueryAnswer.description: Sends a callback query to a bot and returns an answer. Returns an error with code 502 if the bot fails to answer the query before the query timeout expires

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat with the message

message_id.description: Identifier of the message from which the query originated

answerCallbackQuery.description: Sets the result of a callback query; for bots only

show_alert.description: Pass true to show an alert to the user instead of a toast notification

url.description: URL to be opened

cache_time.description: Time during which the result of the query can be cached, in seconds

answerShippingQuery.description: Sets the result of a shipping query; for bots only

error_message.description: An error message, empty on success

answerPreCheckoutQuery.description: Sets the result of a pre-checkout query; for bots only

error_message.description: An error message, empty on success

setGameScore.description: Updates the game score of the specified user in the game; for bots only

chat_id.description: The chat to which the message with the game belongs

edit_message.description: Pass true to edit the game message to include the current scoreboard

force.description: Pass true to update the score even if it decreases. If the score is 0, the user will be deleted from the high score table

setInlineGameScore.description: Updates the game score of the specified user in a game; for bots only

edit_message.description: Pass true to edit the game message to include the current scoreboard

force.description: Pass true to update the score even if it decreases. If the score is 0, the user will be deleted from the high score table

getGameHighScores.description: Returns the high scores for a game and some part of the high score table in the range of the specified user; for bots only

chat_id.description: The chat that contains the message with the game

getInlineGameHighScores.description: Returns game high scores and some part of the high score table in the range of the specified user; for bots only

deleteChatReplyMarkup.description: Deletes the default reply markup from a chat. Must be called after a one-time keyboard or a replyMarkupForceReply reply markup has been used. An updateChatReplyMarkup update will be sent if the reply markup is changed

message_id.description: The message identifier of the used keyboard

sendChatAction.description: Sends a notification about user activity in a chat

message_thread_id.description: If not 0, a message thread identifier in which the action was performed

action.description: The action description; pass null to cancel the currently active action

openChat.description: Informs TDLib that the chat is opened by the user. Many useful activities depend on the chat being opened or closed (e.g., in supergroups and channels all updates are received only for opened chats)

closeChat.description: Informs TDLib that the chat is closed by the user. Many useful activities depend on the chat being opened or closed

viewMessages.description: Informs TDLib that messages are being viewed by the user. Sponsored messages must be marked as viewed only when the entire text of the message is shown on the screen (excluding the button). Many useful activities depend on whether the messages are currently being viewed or not (e.g., marking messages as read, incrementing a view counter, updating a view counter, removing deleted messages in supergroups and channels)

message_ids.description: The identifiers of the messages being viewed

source.description: Source of the message view; pass null to guess the source based on chat open state

force_read.description: Pass true to mark as read the specified messages even the chat is closed

openMessageContent.description: Informs TDLib that the message content has been opened (e.g., the user has opened a photo, video, document, location or venue, or has listened to an audio file or voice note message). An updateMessageContentOpened update will be generated if something has changed

message_id.description: Identifier of the message with the opened content

clickAnimatedEmojiMessage.description: Informs TDLib that a message with an animated emoji was clicked by the user. Returns a big animated sticker to be played or a 404 error if usual animation needs to be played

getInternalLink.description: Returns an HTTPS or a tg: link with the given type. Can be called before authorization

is_http.description: Pass true to create an HTTPS link (only available for some link types); pass false to create a tg: link

getInternalLinkType.description: Returns information about the type of an internal link. Returns a 404 error if the link is not internal. Can be called before authorization

getExternalLinkInfo.description: Returns information about an action to be done when the current user clicks an external link. Don't use this method for links from secret chats if web page preview is disabled in secret chats

getExternalLink.description: Returns an HTTP URL which can be used to automatically authorize the current user on a website after clicking an HTTP link. Use the method getExternalLinkInfo to find whether a prior user confirmation is needed

allow_write_access.description: Pass true if the current user allowed the bot, returned in getExternalLinkInfo, to send them messages

readAllChatMentions.description: Marks all mentions in a chat as read

readAllMessageThreadMentions.description: Marks all mentions in a forum topic as read

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier in which mentions are marked as read

readAllChatReactions.description: Marks all reactions in a chat or a forum topic as read

readAllMessageThreadReactions.description: Marks all reactions in a forum topic as read

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier in which reactions are marked as read

createPrivateChat.description: Returns an existing chat corresponding to a given user

force.description: Pass true to create the chat without a network request. In this case all information about the chat except its type, title and photo can be incorrect

createBasicGroupChat.description: Returns an existing chat corresponding to a known basic group

force.description: Pass true to create the chat without a network request. In this case all information about the chat except its type, title and photo can be incorrect

createSupergroupChat.description: Returns an existing chat corresponding to a known supergroup or channel

force.description: Pass true to create the chat without a network request. In this case all information about the chat except its type, title and photo can be incorrect

createSecretChat.description: Returns an existing chat corresponding to a known secret chat

createNewBasicGroupChat.description: Creates a new basic group and sends a corresponding messageBasicGroupChatCreate. Returns the newly created chat

user_ids.description: Identifiers of users to be added to the basic group; may be empty to create a basic group without other members

title.description: Title of the new basic group; 1-128 characters

message_auto_delete_time.description: Message auto-delete time value, in seconds; must be from 0 up to 365 * 86400 and be divisible by 86400. If 0, then messages aren't deleted automatically

createNewSupergroupChat.description: Creates a new supergroup or channel and sends a corresponding messageSupergroupChatCreate. Returns the newly created chat

title.description: Title of the new chat; 1-128 characters

is_forum.description: Pass true to create a forum supergroup chat

is_channel.description: Pass true to create a channel chat; ignored if a forum is created

location.description: Chat location if a location-based supergroup is being created; pass null to create an ordinary supergroup chat

message_auto_delete_time.description: Message auto-delete time value, in seconds; must be from 0 up to 365 * 86400 and be divisible by 86400. If 0, then messages aren't deleted automatically

for_import.description: Pass true to create a supergroup for importing messages using importMessage

createNewSecretChat.description: Creates a new secret chat. Returns the newly created chat

upgradeBasicGroupChatToSupergroupChat.description: Creates a new supergroup from an existing basic group and sends a corresponding messageChatUpgradeTo and messageChatUpgradeFrom; requires creator privileges. Deactivates the original basic group

chat_id.description: Identifier of the chat to upgrade

getChatListsToAddChat.description: Returns chat lists to which the chat can be added. This is an offline request

addChatToList.description: Adds a chat to a chat list. A chat can't be simultaneously in Main and Archive chat lists, so it is automatically removed from another one if needed

chat_list.description: The chat list. Use getChatListsToAddChat to get suitable chat lists

getChatFolder.description: Returns information about a chat folder by its identifier

createChatFolder.description: Creates new chat folder. Returns information about the created chat folder. There can be up to getOption("chat_folder_count_max") chat folders, but the limit can be increased with Telegram Premium

editChatFolder.description: Edits existing chat folder. Returns information about the edited chat folder

leave_chat_ids.description: Identifiers of the chats to leave. The chats must be pinned or always included in the folder

getChatFolderChatsToLeave.description: Returns identifiers of pinned or always included chats from a chat folder, which are suggested to be left when the chat folder is deleted

reorderChatFolders.description: Changes the order of chat folders

chat_folder_ids.description: Identifiers of chat folders in the new correct order

main_chat_list_position.description: Position of the main chat list among chat folders, 0-based. Can be non-zero only for Premium users

getRecommendedChatFolders.description: Returns recommended chat folders for the current user

getChatFolderDefaultIconName.description: Returns default icon name for a folder. Can be called synchronously

getChatsForChatFolderInviteLink.description: Returns identifiers of chats from a chat folder, suitable for adding to a chat folder invite link

createChatFolderInviteLink.description: Creates a new invite link for a chat folder. A link can be created for a chat folder if it has only pinned and included chats

chat_ids.description: Identifiers of chats to be accessible by the invite link. Use getChatsForChatFolderInviteLink to get suitable chats. Basic groups will be automatically converted to supergroups before link creation

getChatFolderInviteLinks.description: Returns invite links created by the current user for a shareable chat folder

editChatFolderInviteLink.description: Edits an invite link for a chat folder

name.description: New name of the link; 0-32 characters

chat_ids.description: New identifiers of chats to be accessible by the invite link. Use getChatsForChatFolderInviteLink to get suitable chats. Basic groups will be automatically converted to supergroups before link editing

deleteChatFolderInviteLink.description: Deletes an invite link for a chat folder

checkChatFolderInviteLink.description: Checks the validity of an invite link for a chat folder and returns information about the corresponding chat folder

addChatFolderByInviteLink.description: Adds a chat folder by an invite link

invite_link.description: Invite link for the chat folder

chat_ids.description: Identifiers of the chats added to the chat folder. The chats are automatically joined if they aren't joined yet

getChatFolderNewChats.description: Returns new chats added to a shareable chat folder by its owner. The method must be called at most once in getOption("chat_folder_new_chats_update_period") for the given chat folder

processChatFolderNewChats.description: Process new chats added to a shareable chat folder by its owner

added_chat_ids.description: Identifiers of the new chats, which are added to the chat folder. The chats are automatically joined if they aren't joined yet

setChatTitle.description: Changes the chat title. Supported only for basic groups, supergroups and channels. Requires can_change_info administrator right

title.description: New title of the chat; 1-128 characters

setChatPhoto.description: Changes the photo of a chat. Supported only for basic groups, supergroups and channels. Requires can_change_info administrator right

photo.description: New chat photo; pass null to delete the chat photo

setChatMessageAutoDeleteTime.description: Changes the message auto-delete or self-destruct (for secret chats) time in a chat. Requires change_info administrator right in basic groups, supergroups and channels Message auto-delete time can't be changed in a chat with the current user (Saved Messages) and the chat 777000 (Telegram).

message_auto_delete_time.description: New time value, in seconds; unless the chat is secret, it must be from 0 up to 365 * 86400 and be divisible by 86400. If 0, then messages aren't deleted automatically

setChatPermissions.description: Changes the chat members permissions. Supported only for basic groups and supergroups. Requires can_restrict_members administrator right

permissions.description: New non-administrator members permissions in the chat

setChatBackground.description: Changes the background in a specific chat. Supported only in private and secret chats with non-deleted users

background.description: The input background to use; pass null to create a new filled background or to remove the current background

type.description: Background type; pass null to remove the current background

dark_theme_dimming.description: Dimming of the background in dark themes, as a percentage; 0-100

setChatTheme.description: Changes the chat theme. Supported only in private and secret chats

theme_name.description: Name of the new chat theme; pass an empty string to return the default theme

setChatDraftMessage.description: Changes the draft message in a chat

message_thread_id.description: If not 0, a message thread identifier in which the draft was changed

draft_message.description: New draft message; pass null to remove the draft

setChatNotificationSettings.description: Changes the notification settings of a chat. Notification settings of a chat with the current user (Saved Messages) can't be changed

notification_settings.description: New notification settings for the chat. If the chat is muted for more than 366 days, it is considered to be muted forever

toggleChatHasProtectedContent.description: Changes the ability of users to save, forward, or copy chat content. Supported only for basic groups, supergroups and channels. Requires owner privileges

toggleChatIsTranslatable.description: Changes the translatable state of a chat; for Telegram Premium users only

toggleChatIsMarkedAsUnread.description: Changes the marked as unread state of a chat

toggleChatDefaultDisableNotification.description: Changes the value of the default disable_notification parameter, used when a message is sent to a chat

setChatAvailableReactions.description: Changes reactions, available in a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires can_change_info administrator right

available_reactions.description: Reactions available in the chat. All emoji reactions must be active

setChatClientData.description: Changes application-specific data associated with a chat

setChatDescription.description: Changes information about a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires can_change_info administrator right

setChatDiscussionGroup.description: Changes the discussion group of a channel chat; requires can_change_info administrator right in the channel if it is specified

chat_id.description: Identifier of the channel chat. Pass 0 to remove a link from the supergroup passed in the second argument to a linked channel chat (requires can_pin_messages rights in the supergroup)

discussion_chat_id.description: Identifier of a new channel's discussion group. Use 0 to remove the discussion group. Use the method getSuitableDiscussionChats to find all suitable groups. Basic group chats must be first upgraded to supergroup chats. If new chat members don't have access to old messages in the supergroup, then toggleSupergroupIsAllHistoryAvailable must be used first to change that

setChatLocation.description: Changes the location of a chat. Available only for some location-based supergroups, use supergroupFullInfo.can_set_location to check whether the method is allowed to use

location.description: New location for the chat; must be valid and not null

setChatSlowModeDelay.description: Changes the slow mode delay of a chat. Available only for supergroups; requires can_restrict_members rights

slow_mode_delay.description: New slow mode delay for the chat, in seconds; must be one of 0, 10, 30, 60, 300, 900, 3600

pinChatMessage.description: Pins a message in a chat; requires can_pin_messages rights or can_edit_messages rights in the channel

message_id.description: Identifier of the new pinned message

disable_notification.description: Pass true to disable notification about the pinned message. Notifications are always disabled in channels and private chats

only_for_self.description: Pass true to pin the message only for self; private chats only

unpinChatMessage.description: Removes a pinned message from a chat; requires can_pin_messages rights in the group or can_edit_messages rights in the channel

message_id.description: Identifier of the removed pinned message

unpinAllChatMessages.description: Removes all pinned messages from a chat; requires can_pin_messages rights in the group or can_edit_messages rights in the channel

unpinAllMessageThreadMessages.description: Removes all pinned messages from a forum topic; requires can_pin_messages rights in the supergroup

message_thread_id.description: Message thread identifier in which messages will be unpinned

joinChat.description: Adds the current user as a new member to a chat. Private and secret chats can't be joined using this method. May return an error with a message "INVITE_REQUEST_SENT" if only a join request was created

leaveChat.description: Removes the current user from chat members. Private and secret chats can't be left using this method

addChatMember.description: Adds a new member to a chat. Members can't be added to private or secret chats

forward_limit.description: The number of earlier messages from the chat to be forwarded to the new member; up to 100. Ignored for supergroups and channels, or if the added user is a bot

addChatMembers.description: Adds multiple new members to a chat. Currently, this method is only available for supergroups and channels. This method can't be used to join a chat. Members can't be added to a channel if it has more than 200 members

user_ids.description: Identifiers of the users to be added to the chat. The maximum number of added users is 20 for supergroups and 100 for channels

setChatMemberStatus.description: Changes the status of a chat member, needs appropriate privileges. This function is currently not suitable for transferring chat ownership; use transferChatOwnership instead. Use addChatMember or banChatMember if some additional parameters needs to be passed

member_id.description: Member identifier. Chats can be only banned and unbanned in supergroups and channels

status.description: The new status of the member in the chat

banChatMember.description: Bans a member in a chat. Members can't be banned in private or secret chats. In supergroups and channels, the user will not be able to return to the group on their own using invite links, etc., unless unbanned first

banned_until_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the user will be unbanned; 0 if never. If the user is banned for more than 366 days or for less than 30 seconds from the current time, the user is considered to be banned forever. Ignored in basic groups and if a chat is banned

revoke_messages.description: Pass true to delete all messages in the chat for the user that is being removed. Always true for supergroups and channels

canTransferOwnership.description: Checks whether the current session can be used to transfer a chat ownership to another user

transferChatOwnership.description: Changes the owner of a chat. The current user must be a current owner of the chat. Use the method canTransferOwnership to check whether the ownership can be transferred from the current session. Available only for supergroups and channel chats

user_id.description: Identifier of the user to which transfer the ownership. The ownership can't be transferred to a bot or to a deleted user

password.description: The 2-step verification password of the current user

getChatMember.description: Returns information about a single member of a chat

searchChatMembers.description: Searches for a specified query in the first name, last name and usernames of the members of a specified chat. Requires administrator rights in channels

limit.description: The maximum number of users to be returned; up to 200

filter.description: The type of users to search for; pass null to search among all chat members

getChatAdministrators.description: Returns a list of administrators of the chat with their custom titles

clearAllDraftMessages.description: Clears message drafts in all chats

exclude_secret_chats.description: Pass true to keep local message drafts in secret chats

getSavedNotificationSound.description: Returns saved notification sound by its identifier. Returns a 404 error if there is no saved notification sound with the specified identifier

getSavedNotificationSounds.description: Returns list of saved notification sounds. If a sound isn't in the list, then default sound needs to be used

addSavedNotificationSound.description: Adds a new notification sound to the list of saved notification sounds. The new notification sound is added to the top of the list. If it is already in the list, its position isn't changed

removeSavedNotificationSound.description: Removes a notification sound from the list of saved notification sounds

getChatNotificationSettingsExceptions.description: Returns list of chats with non-default notification settings

scope.description: If specified, only chats from the scope will be returned; pass null to return chats from all scopes

compare_sound.description: Pass true to include in the response chats with only non-default sound

getScopeNotificationSettings.description: Returns the notification settings for chats of a given type

scope.description: Types of chats for which to return the notification settings information

setScopeNotificationSettings.description: Changes notification settings for chats of a given type

scope.description: Types of chats for which to change the notification settings

notification_settings.description: The new notification settings for the given scope

resetAllNotificationSettings.description: Resets all notification settings to their default values. By default, all chats are unmuted and message previews are shown

toggleChatIsPinned.description: Changes the pinned state of a chat. There can be up to getOption("pinned_chat_count_max")/getOption("pinned_archived_chat_count_max") pinned non-secret chats and the same number of secret chats in the main/archive chat list. The limit can be increased with Telegram Premium

chat_list.description: Chat list in which to change the pinned state of the chat

is_pinned.description: Pass true to pin the chat; pass false to unpin it

setPinnedChats.description: Changes the order of pinned chats

chat_list.description: Chat list in which to change the order of pinned chats

chat_ids.description: The new list of pinned chats

readChatList.description: Traverse all chats in a chat list and marks all messages in the chats as read

chat_list.description: Chat list in which to mark all chats as read

getAttachmentMenuBot.description: Returns information about a bot that can be added to attachment menu

toggleBotIsAddedToAttachmentMenu.description: Adds or removes a bot to attachment menu. Bot can be added to attachment menu, only if userTypeBot.can_be_added_to_attachment_menu == true

is_added.description: Pass true to add the bot to attachment menu; pass false to remove the bot from attachment menu

allow_write_access.description: Pass true if the current user allowed the bot to send them messages. Ignored if is_added is false

getThemedEmojiStatuses.description: Returns up to 8 emoji statuses, which must be shown right after the default Premium Badge in the emoji status list

clearRecentEmojiStatuses.description: Clears the list of recently used emoji statuses

downloadFile.description: Downloads a file from the cloud. Download progress and completion of the download will be notified through updateFile updates

file_id.description: Identifier of the file to download

priority.description: Priority of the download (1-32). The higher the priority, the earlier the file will be downloaded. If the priorities of two files are equal, then the last one for which downloadFile/addFileToDownloads was called will be downloaded first

offset.description: The starting position from which the file needs to be downloaded

limit.description: Number of bytes which need to be downloaded starting from the "offset" position before the download will automatically be canceled; use 0 to download without a limit

synchronous.description: Pass true to return response only after the file download has succeeded, has failed, has been canceled, or a new downloadFile request with different offset/limit parameters was sent; pass false to return file state immediately, just after the download has been started

getFileDownloadedPrefixSize.description: Returns file downloaded prefix size from a given offset, in bytes

offset.description: Offset from which downloaded prefix size needs to be calculated

cancelDownloadFile.description: Stops the downloading of a file. If a file has already been downloaded, does nothing

file_id.description: Identifier of a file to stop downloading

only_if_pending.description: Pass true to stop downloading only if it hasn't been started, i.e. request hasn't been sent to server

getSuggestedFileName.description: Returns suggested name for saving a file in a given directory

directory.description: Directory in which the file is supposed to be saved

preliminaryUploadFile.description: Preliminary uploads a file to the cloud before sending it in a message, which can be useful for uploading of being recorded voice and video notes. Updates updateFile will be used to notify about upload progress and successful completion of the upload. The file will not have a persistent remote identifier until it will be sent in a message

file_type.description: File type; pass null if unknown

priority.description: Priority of the upload (1-32). The higher the priority, the earlier the file will be uploaded. If the priorities of two files are equal, then the first one for which preliminaryUploadFile was called will be uploaded first

cancelPreliminaryUploadFile.description: Stops the preliminary uploading of a file. Supported only for files uploaded by using preliminaryUploadFile. For other files the behavior is undefined

file_id.description: Identifier of the file to stop uploading

writeGeneratedFilePart.description: Writes a part of a generated file. This method is intended to be used only if the application has no direct access to TDLib's file system, because it is usually slower than a direct write to the destination file

generation_id.description: The identifier of the generation process

offset.description: The offset from which to write the data to the file

setFileGenerationProgress.description: Informs TDLib on a file generation progress

generation_id.description: The identifier of the generation process

expected_size.description: Expected size of the generated file, in bytes; 0 if unknown

local_prefix_size.description: The number of bytes already generated

generation_id.description: The identifier of the generation process

error.description: If passed, the file generation has failed and must be terminated; pass null if the file generation succeeded

readFilePart.description: Reads a part of a file from the TDLib file cache and returns read bytes. This method is intended to be used only if the application has no direct access to TDLib's file system, because it is usually slower than a direct read from the file

file_id.description: Identifier of the file. The file must be located in the TDLib file cache

offset.description: The offset from which to read the file

count.description: Number of bytes to read. An error will be returned if there are not enough bytes available in the file from the specified position. Pass 0 to read all available data from the specified position

deleteFile.description: Deletes a file from the TDLib file cache

file_id.description: Identifier of the file to delete

addFileToDownloads.description: Adds a file from a message to the list of file downloads. Download progress and completion of the download will be notified through updateFile updates. If message database is used, the list of file downloads is persistent across application restarts. The downloading is independent from download using downloadFile, i.e. it continues if downloadFile is canceled or is used to download a part of the file

file_id.description: Identifier of the file to download

chat_id.description: Chat identifier of the message with the file

priority.description: Priority of the download (1-32). The higher the priority, the earlier the file will be downloaded. If the priorities of two files are equal, then the last one for which downloadFile/addFileToDownloads was called will be downloaded first

toggleDownloadIsPaused.description: Changes pause state of a file in the file download list

is_paused.description: Pass true if the download is paused

toggleAllDownloadsArePaused.description: Changes pause state of all files in the file download list

are_paused.description: Pass true to pause all downloads; pass false to unpause them

removeFileFromDownloads.description: Removes a file from the file download list

delete_from_cache.description: Pass true to delete the file from the TDLib file cache

removeAllFilesFromDownloads.description: Removes all files from the file download list

only_active.description: Pass true to remove only active downloads, including paused

only_completed.description: Pass true to remove only completed downloads

delete_from_cache.description: Pass true to delete the file from the TDLib file cache

searchFileDownloads.description: Searches for files in the file download list or recently downloaded files from the list

query.description: Query to search for; may be empty to return all downloaded files

only_active.description: Pass true to search only for active downloads, including paused

only_completed.description: Pass true to search only for completed downloads

offset.description: Offset of the first entry to return as received from the previous request; use empty string to get the first chunk of results

limit.description: The maximum number of files to be returned

getMessageFileType.description: Returns information about a file with messages exported from another application

message_file_head.description: Beginning of the message file; up to 100 first lines

getMessageImportConfirmationText.description: Returns a confirmation text to be shown to the user before starting message import

chat_id.description: Identifier of a chat to which the messages will be imported. It must be an identifier of a private chat with a mutual contact or an identifier of a supergroup chat with can_change_info administrator right

importMessages.description: Imports messages exported from another app

chat_id.description: Identifier of a chat to which the messages will be imported. It must be an identifier of a private chat with a mutual contact or an identifier of a supergroup chat with can_change_info administrator right

message_file.description: File with messages to import. Only inputFileLocal and inputFileGenerated are supported. The file must not be previously uploaded

attached_files.description: Files used in the imported messages. Only inputFileLocal and inputFileGenerated are supported. The files must not be previously uploaded

replacePrimaryChatInviteLink.description: Replaces current primary invite link for a chat with a new primary invite link. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right

createChatInviteLink.description: Creates a new invite link for a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat

expiration_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire; pass 0 if never

member_limit.description: The maximum number of chat members that can join the chat via the link simultaneously; 0-99999; pass 0 if not limited

creates_join_request.description: Pass true if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators. In this case, member_limit must be 0

editChatInviteLink.description: Edits a non-primary invite link for a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

expiration_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the link will expire; pass 0 if never

member_limit.description: The maximum number of chat members that can join the chat via the link simultaneously; 0-99999; pass 0 if not limited

creates_join_request.description: Pass true if users joining the chat via the link need to be approved by chat administrators. In this case, member_limit must be 0

getChatInviteLink.description: Returns information about an invite link. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat to get own links and owner privileges to get other links

getChatInviteLinkCounts.description: Returns list of chat administrators with number of their invite links. Requires owner privileges in the chat

getChatInviteLinks.description: Returns invite links for a chat created by specified administrator. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat to get own links and owner privileges to get other links

creator_user_id.description: User identifier of a chat administrator. Must be an identifier of the current user for non-owner

is_revoked.description: Pass true if revoked links needs to be returned instead of active or expired

offset_date.description: Creation date of an invite link starting after which to return invite links; use 0 to get results from the beginning

offset_invite_link.description: Invite link starting after which to return invite links; use empty string to get results from the beginning

limit.description: The maximum number of invite links to return; up to 100

getChatInviteLinkMembers.description: Returns chat members joined a chat via an invite link. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

invite_link.description: Invite link for which to return chat members

offset_member.description: A chat member from which to return next chat members; pass null to get results from the beginning

limit.description: The maximum number of chat members to return; up to 100

revokeChatInviteLink.description: Revokes invite link for a chat. Available for basic groups, supergroups, and channels. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links. If a primary link is revoked, then additionally to the revoked link returns new primary link

deleteRevokedChatInviteLink.description: Deletes revoked chat invite links. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

deleteAllRevokedChatInviteLinks.description: Deletes all revoked chat invite links created by a given chat administrator. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

creator_user_id.description: User identifier of a chat administrator, which links will be deleted. Must be an identifier of the current user for non-owner

checkChatInviteLink.description: Checks the validity of an invite link for a chat and returns information about the corresponding chat

joinChatByInviteLink.description: Uses an invite link to add the current user to the chat if possible. May return an error with a message "INVITE_REQUEST_SENT" if only a join request was created

getChatJoinRequests.description: Returns pending join requests in a chat

invite_link.description: Invite link for which to return join requests. If empty, all join requests will be returned. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

query.description: A query to search for in the first names, last names and usernames of the users to return

offset_request.description: A chat join request from which to return next requests; pass null to get results from the beginning

limit.description: The maximum number of requests to join the chat to return

processChatJoinRequest.description: Handles a pending join request in a chat

user_id.description: Identifier of the user that sent the request

approve.description: Pass true to approve the request; pass false to decline it

processChatJoinRequests.description: Handles all pending join requests for a given link in a chat

invite_link.description: Invite link for which to process join requests. If empty, all join requests will be processed. Requires administrator privileges and can_invite_users right in the chat for own links and owner privileges for other links

approve.description: Pass true to approve all requests; pass false to decline them

user_id.description: Identifier of the user to be called

protocol.description: The call protocols supported by the application

is_video.description: Pass true to create a video call

protocol.description: The call protocols supported by the application

is_disconnected.description: Pass true if the user was disconnected

is_video.description: Pass true if the call was a video call

connection_id.description: Identifier of the connection used during the call

comment.description: An optional user comment if the rating is less than 5

problems.description: List of the exact types of problems with the call, specified by the user

sendCallDebugInformation.description: Sends debug information for a call to Telegram servers

sendCallLog.description: Sends log file for a call to Telegram servers

log_file.description: Call log file. Only inputFileLocal and inputFileGenerated are supported

getVideoChatAvailableParticipants.description: Returns list of participant identifiers, on whose behalf a video chat in the chat can be joined

setVideoChatDefaultParticipant.description: Changes default participant identifier, on whose behalf a video chat in the chat will be joined

default_participant_id.description: Default group call participant identifier to join the video chats

createVideoChat.description: Creates a video chat (a group call bound to a chat). Available only for basic groups, supergroups and channels; requires can_manage_video_chats rights

chat_id.description: Identifier of a chat in which the video chat will be created

title.description: Group call title; if empty, chat title will be used

start_date.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the group call is supposed to be started by an administrator; 0 to start the video chat immediately. The date must be at least 10 seconds and at most 8 days in the future

is_rtmp_stream.description: Pass true to create an RTMP stream instead of an ordinary video chat; requires creator privileges

getVideoChatRtmpUrl.description: Returns RTMP URL for streaming to the chat; requires creator privileges

replaceVideoChatRtmpUrl.description: Replaces the current RTMP URL for streaming to the chat; requires creator privileges

getGroupCall.description: Returns information about a group call

toggleGroupCallEnabledStartNotification.description: Toggles whether the current user will receive a notification when the group call will start; scheduled group calls only

enabled_start_notification.description: New value of the enabled_start_notification setting

joinGroupCall.description: Joins an active group call. Returns join response payload for tgcalls

participant_id.description: Identifier of a group call participant, which will be used to join the call; pass null to join as self; video chats only

audio_source_id.description: Caller audio channel synchronization source identifier; received from tgcalls

payload.description: Group call join payload; received from tgcalls

is_muted.description: Pass true to join the call with muted microphone

is_my_video_enabled.description: Pass true if the user's video is enabled

invite_hash.description: If non-empty, invite hash to be used to join the group call without being muted by administrators

startGroupCallScreenSharing.description: Starts screen sharing in a joined group call. Returns join response payload for tgcalls

audio_source_id.description: Screen sharing audio channel synchronization source identifier; received from tgcalls

payload.description: Group call join payload; received from tgcalls

toggleGroupCallScreenSharingIsPaused.description: Pauses or unpauses screen sharing in a joined group call

is_paused.description: Pass true to pause screen sharing; pass false to unpause it

endGroupCallScreenSharing.description: Ends screen sharing in a joined group call

setGroupCallTitle.description: Sets group call title. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed group call flag

toggleGroupCallMuteNewParticipants.description: Toggles whether new participants of a group call can be unmuted only by administrators of the group call. Requires groupCall.can_toggle_mute_new_participants group call flag

mute_new_participants.description: New value of the mute_new_participants setting

inviteGroupCallParticipants.description: Invites users to an active group call. Sends a service message of type messageInviteToGroupCall for video chats

user_ids.description: User identifiers. At most 10 users can be invited simultaneously

getGroupCallInviteLink.description: Returns invite link to a video chat in a public chat

can_self_unmute.description: Pass true if the invite link needs to contain an invite hash, passing which to joinGroupCall would allow the invited user to unmute themselves. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed group call flag

revokeGroupCallInviteLink.description: Revokes invite link for a group call. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed group call flag

startGroupCallRecording.description: Starts recording of an active group call. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed group call flag

record_video.description: Pass true to record a video file instead of an audio file

use_portrait_orientation.description: Pass true to use portrait orientation for video instead of landscape one

endGroupCallRecording.description: Ends recording of an active group call. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed group call flag

toggleGroupCallIsMyVideoPaused.description: Toggles whether current user's video is paused

is_my_video_paused.description: Pass true if the current user's video is paused

toggleGroupCallIsMyVideoEnabled.description: Toggles whether current user's video is enabled

is_my_video_enabled.description: Pass true if the current user's video is enabled

setGroupCallParticipantIsSpeaking.description: Informs TDLib that speaking state of a participant of an active group has changed

audio_source.description: Group call participant's synchronization audio source identifier, or 0 for the current user

is_speaking.description: Pass true if the user is speaking

toggleGroupCallParticipantIsMuted.description: Toggles whether a participant of an active group call is muted, unmuted, or allowed to unmute themselves

is_muted.description: Pass true to mute the user; pass false to unmute the them

setGroupCallParticipantVolumeLevel.description: Changes volume level of a participant of an active group call. If the current user can manage the group call, then the participant's volume level will be changed for all users with the default volume level

volume_level.description: New participant's volume level; 1-20000 in hundreds of percents

toggleGroupCallParticipantIsHandRaised.description: Toggles whether a group call participant hand is rased

is_hand_raised.description: Pass true if the user's hand needs to be raised. Only self hand can be raised. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed group call flag to lower other's hand

loadGroupCallParticipants.description: Loads more participants of a group call. The loaded participants will be received through updates. Use the field groupCall.loaded_all_participants to check whether all participants have already been loaded

group_call_id.description: Group call identifier. The group call must be previously received through getGroupCall and must be joined or being joined

limit.description: The maximum number of participants to load; up to 100

endGroupCall.description: Ends a group call. Requires groupCall.can_be_managed

getGroupCallStreams.description: Returns information about available group call streams

getGroupCallStreamSegment.description: Returns a file with a segment of a group call stream in a modified OGG format for audio or MPEG-4 format for video

time_offset.description: Point in time when the stream segment begins; Unix timestamp in milliseconds

scale.description: Segment duration scale; 0-1. Segment's duration is 1000/(2**scale) milliseconds

channel_id.description: Identifier of an audio/video channel to get as received from tgcalls

video_quality.description: Video quality as received from tgcalls; pass null to get the worst available quality

toggleMessageSenderIsBlocked.description: Changes the block state of a message sender. Currently, only users and supergroup chats can be blocked

sender_id.description: Identifier of a message sender to block/unblock

blockMessageSenderFromReplies.description: Blocks an original sender of a message in the Replies chat

message_id.description: The identifier of an incoming message in the Replies chat

delete_message.description: Pass true to delete the message

delete_all_messages.description: Pass true to delete all messages from the same sender

report_spam.description: Pass true to report the sender to the Telegram moderators

getBlockedMessageSenders.description: Returns users and chats that were blocked by the current user

offset.description: Number of users and chats to skip in the result; must be non-negative

limit.description: The maximum number of users and chats to return; up to 100

addContact.description: Adds a user to the contact list or edits an existing contact by their user identifier

contact.description: The contact to add or edit; phone number may be empty and needs to be specified only if known, vCard is ignored

share_phone_number.description: Pass true to share the current user's phone number with the new contact. A corresponding rule to userPrivacySettingShowPhoneNumber will be added if needed. Use the field userFullInfo.need_phone_number_privacy_exception to check whether the current user needs to be asked to share their phone number

importContacts.description: Adds new contacts or edits existing contacts by their phone numbers; contacts' user identifiers are ignored

contacts.description: The list of contacts to import or edit; contacts' vCard are ignored and are not imported

searchContacts.description: Searches for the specified query in the first names, last names and usernames of the known user contacts

query.description: Query to search for; may be empty to return all contacts

limit.description: The maximum number of users to be returned

removeContacts.description: Removes users from the contact list

user_ids.description: Identifiers of users to be deleted

getImportedContactCount.description: Returns the total number of imported contacts

changeImportedContacts.description: Changes imported contacts using the list of contacts saved on the device. Imports newly added contacts and, if at least the file database is enabled, deletes recently deleted contacts. Query result depends on the result of the previous query, so only one query is possible at the same time

contacts.description: The new list of contacts, contact's vCard are ignored and are not imported

clearImportedContacts.description: Clears all imported contacts, contact list remains unchanged

setUserPersonalProfilePhoto.description: Changes a personal profile photo of a contact user

photo.description: Profile photo to set; pass null to delete the photo; inputChatPhotoPrevious isn't supported in this function

suggestUserProfilePhoto.description: Suggests a profile photo to another regular user with common messages

photo.description: Profile photo to suggest; inputChatPhotoPrevious isn't supported in this function

searchUserByPhoneNumber.description: Searches a user by their phone number. Returns a 404 error if the user can't be found

sharePhoneNumber.description: Shares the phone number of the current user with a mutual contact. Supposed to be called when the user clicks on chatActionBarSharePhoneNumber

user_id.description: Identifier of the user with whom to share the phone number. The user must be a mutual contact

getUserProfilePhotos.description: Returns the profile photos of a user. Personal and public photo aren't returned

offset.description: The number of photos to skip; must be non-negative

limit.description: The maximum number of photos to be returned; up to 100

getStickers.description: Returns stickers from the installed sticker sets that correspond to any of the given emoji or can be found by sticker-specific keywords. If the query is non-empty, then favorite, recently used or trending stickers may also be returned

sticker_type.description: Type of the stickers to return

query.description: Search query; a space-separated list of emoji or a keyword prefix. If empty, returns all known installed stickers

limit.description: The maximum number of stickers to be returned

chat_id.description: Chat identifier for which to return stickers. Available custom emoji stickers may be different for different chats

searchStickers.description: Searches for stickers from public sticker sets that correspond to any of the given emoji

sticker_type.description: Type of the stickers to return

emojis.description: Space-separated list of emoji to search for; must be non-empty

limit.description: The maximum number of stickers to be returned; 0-100

getPremiumStickers.description: Returns premium stickers from regular sticker sets

limit.description: The maximum number of stickers to be returned; 0-100

getInstalledStickerSets.description: Returns a list of installed sticker sets

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to return

getArchivedStickerSets.description: Returns a list of archived sticker sets

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to return

offset_sticker_set_id.description: Identifier of the sticker set from which to return the result

limit.description: The maximum number of sticker sets to return; up to 100

getTrendingStickerSets.description: Returns a list of trending sticker sets. For optimal performance, the number of returned sticker sets is chosen by TDLib

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to return

offset.description: The offset from which to return the sticker sets; must be non-negative

limit.description: The maximum number of sticker sets to be returned; up to 100. For optimal performance, the number of returned sticker sets is chosen by TDLib and can be smaller than the specified limit, even if the end of the list has not been reached

getAttachedStickerSets.description: Returns a list of sticker sets attached to a file, including regular, mask, and emoji sticker sets. Currently, only animations, photos, and videos can have attached sticker sets

getStickerSet.description: Returns information about a sticker set by its identifier

searchStickerSet.description: Searches for a sticker set by its name

searchInstalledStickerSets.description: Searches for installed sticker sets by looking for specified query in their title and name

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to search for

limit.description: The maximum number of sticker sets to return

searchStickerSets.description: Searches for ordinary sticker sets by looking for specified query in their title and name. Excludes installed sticker sets from the results

changeStickerSet.description: Installs/uninstalls or activates/archives a sticker set

is_archived.description: The new value of is_archived. A sticker set can't be installed and archived simultaneously

viewTrendingStickerSets.description: Informs the server that some trending sticker sets have been viewed by the user

sticker_set_ids.description: Identifiers of viewed trending sticker sets

reorderInstalledStickerSets.description: Changes the order of installed sticker sets

sticker_type.description: Type of the sticker sets to reorder

sticker_set_ids.description: Identifiers of installed sticker sets in the new correct order

getRecentStickers.description: Returns a list of recently used stickers

is_attached.description: Pass true to return stickers and masks that were recently attached to photos or video files; pass false to return recently sent stickers

addRecentSticker.description: Manually adds a new sticker to the list of recently used stickers. The new sticker is added to the top of the list. If the sticker was already in the list, it is removed from the list first. Only stickers belonging to a sticker set can be added to this list. Emoji stickers can't be added to recent stickers

is_attached.description: Pass true to add the sticker to the list of stickers recently attached to photo or video files; pass false to add the sticker to the list of recently sent stickers

removeRecentSticker.description: Removes a sticker from the list of recently used stickers

is_attached.description: Pass true to remove the sticker from the list of stickers recently attached to photo or video files; pass false to remove the sticker from the list of recently sent stickers

clearRecentStickers.description: Clears the list of recently used stickers

is_attached.description: Pass true to clear the list of stickers recently attached to photo or video files; pass false to clear the list of recently sent stickers

addFavoriteSticker.description: Adds a new sticker to the list of favorite stickers. The new sticker is added to the top of the list. If the sticker was already in the list, it is removed from the list first. Only stickers belonging to a sticker set can be added to this list. Emoji stickers can't be added to favorite stickers

removeFavoriteSticker.description: Removes a sticker from the list of favorite stickers

sticker.description: Sticker file to delete from the list

getStickerEmojis.description: Returns emoji corresponding to a sticker. The list is only for informational purposes, because a sticker is always sent with a fixed emoji from the corresponding Sticker object

searchEmojis.description: Searches for emojis by keywords. Supported only if the file database is enabled

exact_match.description: Pass true if only emojis, which exactly match the text, needs to be returned

input_language_codes.description: List of possible IETF language tags of the user's input language; may be empty if unknown

type.description: Type of emoji categories to return; pass null to get default emoji categories

getAnimatedEmoji.description: Returns an animated emoji corresponding to a given emoji. Returns a 404 error if the emoji has no animated emoji

getEmojiSuggestionsUrl.description: Returns an HTTP URL which can be used to automatically log in to the translation platform and suggest new emoji replacements. The URL will be valid for 30 seconds after generation

language_code.description: Language code for which the emoji replacements will be suggested

getCustomEmojiStickers.description: Returns list of custom emoji stickers by their identifiers. Stickers are returned in arbitrary order. Only found stickers are returned

custom_emoji_ids.description: Identifiers of custom emoji stickers. At most 200 custom emoji stickers can be received simultaneously

getDefaultChatPhotoCustomEmojiStickers.description: Returns default list of custom emoji stickers for placing on a chat photo

getDefaultProfilePhotoCustomEmojiSticker.description: Returns default list of custom emoji stickers for placing on a profile photo

addSavedAnimation.description: Manually adds a new animation to the list of saved animations. The new animation is added to the beginning of the list. If the animation was already in the list, it is removed first. Only non-secret video animations with MIME type "video/mp4" can be added to the list

animation.description: The animation file to be added. Only animations known to the server (i.e., successfully sent via a message) can be added to the list

removeSavedAnimation.description: Removes an animation from the list of saved animations

getRecentInlineBots.description: Returns up to 20 recently used inline bots in the order of their last usage

searchHashtags.description: Searches for recently used hashtags by their prefix

limit.description: The maximum number of hashtags to be returned

removeRecentHashtag.description: Removes a hashtag from the list of recently used hashtags

getWebPagePreview.description: Returns a web page preview by the text of the message. Do not call this function too often. Returns a 404 error if the web page has no preview

getWebPageInstantView.description: Returns an instant view version of a web page if available. Returns a 404 error if the web page has no instant view page

url.description: The web page URL

force_full.description: Pass true to get full instant view for the web page

setProfilePhoto.description: Changes a profile photo for the current user

is_public.description: Pass true to set a public photo, which will be visible even the main photo is hidden by privacy settings

profile_photo_id.description: Identifier of the profile photo to delete

setName.description: Changes the first and last name of the current user

first_name.description: The new value of the first name for the current user; 1-64 characters

last_name.description: The new value of the optional last name for the current user; 0-64 characters

setBio.description: Changes the bio of the current user

bio.description: The new value of the user bio; 0-getOption("bio_length_max") characters without line feeds

setUsername.description: Changes the editable username of the current user

username.description: The new value of the username. Use an empty string to remove the username. The username can't be completely removed if there is another active or disabled username

toggleUsernameIsActive.description: Changes active state for a username of the current user. The editable username can't be disabled. May return an error with a message "USERNAMES_ACTIVE_TOO_MUCH" if the maximum number of active usernames has been reached

is_active.description: Pass true to activate the username; pass false to disable it

reorderActiveUsernames.description: Changes order of active usernames of the current user

usernames.description: The new order of active usernames. All currently active usernames must be specified

setEmojiStatus.description: Changes the emoji status of the current user; for Telegram Premium users only

emoji_status.description: New emoji status; pass null to switch to the default badge

duration.description: Duration of the status, in seconds; pass 0 to keep the status active until it will be changed manually

setLocation.description: Changes the location of the current user. Needs to be called if getOption("is_location_visible") is true and location changes for more than 1 kilometer

location.description: The new location of the user

changePhoneNumber.description: Changes the phone number of the user and sends an authentication code to the user's new phone number. On success, returns information about the sent code

phone_number.description: The new phone number of the user in international format

settings.description: Settings for the authentication of the user's phone number; pass null to use default settings

resendChangePhoneNumberCode.description: Resends the authentication code sent to confirm a new phone number for the current user. Works only if the previously received authenticationCodeInfo next_code_type was not null and the server-specified timeout has passed

checkChangePhoneNumberCode.description: Checks the authentication code sent to confirm a new phone number of the user

getUserLink.description: Returns an HTTPS link, which can be used to get information about the current user

searchUserByToken.description: Searches a user by a token from the user's link

setCommands.description: Sets the list of commands supported by the bot for the given user scope and language; for bots only

scope.description: The scope to which the commands are relevant; pass null to change commands in the default bot command scope

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the commands will be applied to all users from the given scope, for which language there are no dedicated commands

deleteCommands.description: Deletes commands supported by the bot for the given user scope and language; for bots only

scope.description: The scope to which the commands are relevant; pass null to delete commands in the default bot command scope

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

getCommands.description: Returns list of commands supported by the bot for the given user scope and language; for bots only

scope.description: The scope to which the commands are relevant; pass null to get commands in the default bot command scope

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

setMenuButton.description: Sets menu button for the given user or for all users; for bots only

user_id.description: Identifier of the user or 0 to set menu button for all users

getMenuButton.description: Returns menu button set by the bot for the given user; for bots only

user_id.description: Identifier of the user or 0 to get the default menu button

setDefaultGroupAdministratorRights.description: Sets default administrator rights for adding the bot to basic group and supergroup chats; for bots only

default_group_administrator_rights.description: Default administrator rights for adding the bot to basic group and supergroup chats; may be null

setDefaultChannelAdministratorRights.description: Sets default administrator rights for adding the bot to channel chats; for bots only

default_channel_administrator_rights.description: Default administrator rights for adding the bot to channels; may be null

setBotName.description: Sets the name of a bot. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the description will be shown to all users, for which language there are no dedicated description

name.description: New bot's name on the specified language; 0-64 characters; must be non-empty if language code is empty

getBotName.description: Returns the name of a bot in the given language. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

setBotProfilePhoto.description: Changes a profile photo for a bot

photo.description: Profile photo to set; pass null to delete the chat photo

toggleBotUsernameIsActive.description: Changes active state for a username of a bot. The editable username can't be disabled. May return an error with a message "USERNAMES_ACTIVE_TOO_MUCH" if the maximum number of active usernames has been reached. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

is_active.description: Pass true to activate the username; pass false to disable it

reorderActiveBotUsernames.description: Changes order of active usernames of a bot. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

usernames.description: The new order of active usernames. All currently active usernames must be specified

setBotInfoDescription.description: Sets the text shown in the chat with a bot if the chat is empty. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the description will be shown to all users, for which language there are no dedicated description

description.description: New bot's description on the specified language

getBotInfoDescription.description: Returns the text shown in the chat with a bot if the chat is empty in the given language. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

setBotInfoShortDescription.description: Sets the text shown on a bot's profile page and sent together with the link when users share the bot. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the short description will be shown to all users, for which language there are no dedicated description

short_description.description: New bot's short description on the specified language

getBotInfoShortDescription.description: Returns the text shown on a bot's profile page and sent together with the link when users share the bot in the given language. Can be called only if userTypeBot.can_be_edited == true

language_code.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code or an empty string

getActiveSessions.description: Returns all active sessions of the current user

terminateSession.description: Terminates a session of the current user

terminateAllOtherSessions.description: Terminates all other sessions of the current user

toggleSessionCanAcceptCalls.description: Toggles whether a session can accept incoming calls

can_accept_calls.description: Pass true to allow accepting incoming calls by the session; pass false otherwise

toggleSessionCanAcceptSecretChats.description: Toggles whether a session can accept incoming secret chats

can_accept_secret_chats.description: Pass true to allow accepting secret chats by the session; pass false otherwise

setInactiveSessionTtl.description: Changes the period of inactivity after which sessions will automatically be terminated

inactive_session_ttl_days.description: New number of days of inactivity before sessions will be automatically terminated; 1-366 days

getConnectedWebsites.description: Returns all website where the current user used Telegram to log in

disconnectWebsite.description: Disconnects website from the current user's Telegram account

disconnectAllWebsites.description: Disconnects all websites from the current user's Telegram account

setSupergroupUsername.description: Changes the editable username of a supergroup or channel, requires owner privileges in the supergroup or channel

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

username.description: New value of the username. Use an empty string to remove the username. The username can't be completely removed if there is another active or disabled username

toggleSupergroupUsernameIsActive.description: Changes active state for a username of a supergroup or channel, requires owner privileges in the supergroup or channel. The editable username can't be disabled. May return an error with a message "USERNAMES_ACTIVE_TOO_MUCH" if the maximum number of active usernames has been reached

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

is_active.description: Pass true to activate the username; pass false to disable it

disableAllSupergroupUsernames.description: Disables all active non-editable usernames of a supergroup or channel, requires owner privileges in the supergroup or channel

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

reorderSupergroupActiveUsernames.description: Changes order of active usernames of a supergroup or channel, requires owner privileges in the supergroup or channel

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

usernames.description: The new order of active usernames. All currently active usernames must be specified

setSupergroupStickerSet.description: Changes the sticker set of a supergroup; requires can_change_info administrator right

sticker_set_id.description: New value of the supergroup sticker set identifier. Use 0 to remove the supergroup sticker set

toggleSupergroupSignMessages.description: Toggles whether sender signature is added to sent messages in a channel; requires can_change_info administrator right

toggleSupergroupJoinToSendMessages.description: Toggles whether joining is mandatory to send messages to a discussion supergroup; requires can_restrict_members administrator right

toggleSupergroupJoinByRequest.description: Toggles whether all users directly joining the supergroup need to be approved by supergroup administrators; requires can_restrict_members administrator right

toggleSupergroupIsAllHistoryAvailable.description: Toggles whether the message history of a supergroup is available to new members; requires can_change_info administrator right

toggleSupergroupHasHiddenMembers.description: Toggles whether non-administrators can receive only administrators and bots using getSupergroupMembers or searchChatMembers. Can be called only if supergroupFullInfo.can_hide_members == true

toggleSupergroupHasAggressiveAntiSpamEna.description: Toggles whether aggressive anti-spam checks are enabled in the supergroup. Can be called only if supergroupFullInfo.can_toggle_aggressive_anti_spam == true

supergroup_id.description: The identifier of the supergroup, which isn't a broadcast group

toggleSupergroupIsForum.description: Toggles whether the supergroup is a forum; requires owner privileges in the supergroup. Discussion supergroups can't be converted to forums

toggleSupergroupIsBroadcastGroup.description: Upgrades supergroup to a broadcast group; requires owner privileges in the supergroup

reportSupergroupSpam.description: Reports messages in a supergroup as spam; requires administrator rights in the supergroup

reportSupergroupAntiSpamFalsePositive.description: Reports a false deletion of a message by aggressive anti-spam checks; requires administrator rights in the supergroup. Can be called only for messages from chatEventMessageDeleted with can_report_anti_spam_false_positive == true

message_id.description: Identifier of the erroneously deleted message

getSupergroupMembers.description: Returns information about members or banned users in a supergroup or channel. Can be used only if supergroupFullInfo.can_get_members == true; additionally, administrator privileges may be required for some filters

supergroup_id.description: Identifier of the supergroup or channel

filter.description: The type of users to return; pass null to use supergroupMembersFilterRecent

offset.description: Number of users to skip

limit.description: The maximum number of users be returned; up to 200

closeSecretChat.description: Closes a secret chat, effectively transferring its state to secretChatStateClosed

getChatEventLog.description: Returns a list of service actions taken by chat members and administrators in the last 48 hours. Available only for supergroups and channels. Requires administrator rights. Returns results in reverse chronological order (i.e., in order of decreasing event_id)

query.description: Search query by which to filter events

from_event_id.description: Identifier of an event from which to return results. Use 0 to get results from the latest events

limit.description: The maximum number of events to return; up to 100

filters.description: The types of events to return; pass null to get chat events of all types

user_ids.description: User identifiers by which to filter events. By default, events relating to all users will be returned

getPaymentForm.description: Returns an invoice payment form. This method must be called when the user presses inlineKeyboardButtonBuy

theme.description: Preferred payment form theme; pass null to use the default theme

validateOrderInfo.description: Validates the order information provided by a user and returns the available shipping options for a flexible invoice

order_info.description: The order information, provided by the user; pass null if empty

allow_save.description: Pass true to save the order information

sendPaymentForm.description: Sends a filled-out payment form to the bot for final verification

payment_form_id.description: Payment form identifier returned by getPaymentForm

order_info_id.description: Identifier returned by validateOrderInfo, or an empty string

shipping_option_id.description: Identifier of a chosen shipping option, if applicable

credentials.description: The credentials chosen by user for payment

tip_amount.description: Chosen by the user amount of tip in the smallest units of the currency

getPaymentReceipt.description: Returns information about a successful payment

chat_id.description: Chat identifier of the messagePaymentSuccessful message

getSavedOrderInfo.description: Returns saved order information. Returns a 404 error if there is no saved order information

deleteSavedCredentials.description: Deletes saved credentials for all payment provider bots

createInvoiceLink.description: Creates a link for the given invoice; for bots only

invoice.description: Information about the invoice of the type inputMessageInvoice

getSupportUser.description: Returns a user that can be contacted to get support

getBackgrounds.description: Returns backgrounds installed by the user

for_dark_theme.description: Pass true to order returned backgrounds for a dark theme

getBackgroundUrl.description: Constructs a persistent HTTP URL for a background

searchBackground.description: Searches for a background by its name

setBackground.description: Changes the background selected by the user; adds background to the list of installed backgrounds

background.description: The input background to use; pass null to create a new filled background or to remove the current background

type.description: Background type; pass null to use the default type of the remote background or to remove the current background

for_dark_theme.description: Pass true if the background is changed for a dark theme

removeBackground.description: Removes background from the list of installed backgrounds

resetBackgrounds.description: Resets list of installed backgrounds to its default value

getLocalizationTargetInfo.description: Returns information about the current localization target. This is an offline request if only_local is true. Can be called before authorization

only_local.description: Pass true to get only locally available information without sending network requests

getLanguagePackInfo.description: Returns information about a language pack. Returned language pack identifier may be different from a provided one. Can be called before authorization

getLanguagePackStrings.description: Returns strings from a language pack in the current localization target by their keys. Can be called before authorization

language_pack_id.description: Language pack identifier of the strings to be returned

keys.description: Language pack keys of the strings to be returned; leave empty to request all available strings

synchronizeLanguagePack.description: Fetches the latest versions of all strings from a language pack in the current localization target from the server. This method doesn't need to be called explicitly for the current used/base language packs. Can be called before authorization

addCustomServerLanguagePack.description: Adds a custom server language pack to the list of installed language packs in current localization target. Can be called before authorization

language_pack_id.description: Identifier of a language pack to be added

setCustomLanguagePack.description: Adds or changes a custom local language pack to the current localization target

info.description: Information about the language pack. Language pack ID must start with 'X', consist only of English letters, digits and hyphens, and must not exceed 64 characters. Can be called before authorization

strings.description: Strings of the new language pack

editCustomLanguagePackInfo.description: Edits information about a custom local language pack in the current localization target. Can be called before authorization

info.description: New information about the custom local language pack

setCustomLanguagePackString.description: Adds, edits or deletes a string in a custom local language pack. Can be called before authorization

language_pack_id.description: Identifier of a previously added custom local language pack in the current localization target

deleteLanguagePack.description: Deletes all information about a language pack in the current localization target. The language pack which is currently in use (including base language pack) or is being synchronized can't be deleted. Can be called before authorization

language_pack_id.description: Identifier of the language pack to delete

registerDevice.description: Registers the currently used device for receiving push notifications. Returns a globally unique identifier of the push notification subscription

other_user_ids.description: List of user identifiers of other users currently using the application

processPushNotification.description: Handles a push notification. Returns error with code 406 if the push notification is not supported and connection to the server is required to fetch new data. Can be called before authorization

payload.description: JSON-encoded push notification payload with all fields sent by the server, and "google.sent_time" and "google.notification.sound" fields added

getPushReceiverId.description: Returns a globally unique push notification subscription identifier for identification of an account, which has received a push notification. Can be called synchronously

getRecentlyVisitedTMeUrls.description: Returns t.me URLs recently visited by a newly registered user

referrer.description: Google Play referrer to identify the user

getOption.description: Returns the value of an option by its name. (Check the list of available options on https://core.telegram.org/tdlib/options.) Can be called before authorization. Can be called synchronously for options "version" and "commit_hash"
